Reviews.Title: Rubber Bumper Ba-Humbug
Reviews.Author: Gregory Ziglar "Greg Ziglar"
Reviews.Content: Poorly designed, poorly fitting, bulky and unwieldly, likely to cause camera to be dropped.  Not Designed to work with accessories for the camera, will not work with the external battery pack used by many peopleon thier cameras.  The lens shield is a slip on, does not stay in position and can disable or damage your zoom function.  Not effective as asun shield, lens cap almost impossible to install or remove with unit installed.  Manufacture is totally non-responsive to inquires.

Reviews.Title: Best Protection for your Investment
Reviews.Author: Salman Shaikh
Reviews.Content: Pros:Great FitGreat FeelGreat ProtectionCons:NONEBottom Line:Get it and protect it

Reviews.Title: Camera armor
Reviews.Author: Richard Mills
Reviews.Content: Camera Armor Protection System, Black Color, for Nikon D70 /70S SLR CameraI really like it. As a sports photographer, and a person who carries more than 1 camera this product provides protection from elements and jousling.I recently ordered a second one. One minor caveat, I did have the front lens protector slip off unnoticed. Watch that!

Reviews.Title: Camera armor
Reviews.Author: cecil t durham jr
Reviews.Content: Somewhat difficult to get on and off.Increases the bulk of the equipment significantly and makes the camera quite awkward to operate.

Reviews.Title: D70 Armor
Reviews.Author: NunchakuPro
Reviews.Content: It works fine. I don't know why there are so many complaints. I don't have to carry a bag anymore (only a small bag for smaller accessories). I've dropped it once during a shoot. Not one scratch. Peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: J. Fogle
Reviews.Content: i have had it for a year and a half and i love it. i think it is well worth the investment. my brother is an avid photographer and he thinks armor is silly but i have an active family and he is a bachlor. i dont use the hood because it is big and i have a plastic one i flip around when needed. it does cover any markings on the camera so you have to learn where everything is and what its for. i had to do some minor surgery with mancure scissors to reveil the thumb wheels, but it was easy to do.

Reviews.Title: My boss is clumsy!
Reviews.Author: MattPeck
Reviews.Content: He's a dropper. This is the best protection other than a weightless environment. some buttons are hard to find without the white on camera legend.  Otherwise way solid.The D70 version was very good.  But the D90 version was a vast improvement in quality.

Reviews.Title: Camera Armor for Nikon D70
Reviews.Author: nvpete
Reviews.Content: I bought this thinking that it would protect my camera from everyday bumps.  However after I installed it I found it to be cumbersome and not a really good thing to have on a camera for everyday use.  It now sits in a box.  Save your money.

Reviews.Title: expensive camera coat
Reviews.Author: Hoang Thach
Reviews.Content: It protects the camera body very well. It is no problem with tropical weather. I mean it works with humidity weather. Some people are afraid that the water vapor may be under the coat but it is OK. I stay inside the forest in northern of Vietnam for 1 month. It save my camera in limestone terrain.The price should be $25-30

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Security
Reviews.Author: popster "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Fits camera perfectly and provides additional protection while looking good.  Have received numerous inquiries and favorable comments by other camera enthusists.  Some of those will likely purchase the product for their cameras.

Reviews.Title: hard to adjust
Reviews.Author: Albert I. Reiner
Reviews.Content: I will NOT be sending this back BUT I really will not test it as for shock, I bought as part of a package with the strap (I REALLY LIKE the strap). The camera armor looks as though it might help with water resistance . Also the sun shade is first rate I replaced my Nikon Shade with it.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disappointed..
Reviews.Author: D. Shutiok
Reviews.Content: the skin is somewhat difficult to apply.. I have serious doubts  as to it s protection abiltity.. I  will choose  not to depend on it or to purposefully test it!

Reviews.Title: Fits D70 Perfectly
Reviews.Author: D. Brinkley
Reviews.Content: I bought Camera Armor for my D70 since its plastic body needs some cushioning.  The armor fit like a glove.  All the controls, etc. are still accessible while protected.  It's a little hard to read the black on black labels for the controls, but if you know which is which anyway, it's no big drawback.  I found it a little difficult to rotate the rear dial at first, but it loosened up after a bit.  Overall I'm very pleased and glad I bought the product.
